Original Persona: A backpacker who uses interactive maps and virtual reality tours to plan their next adventure
Expanded Persona: Meet Kai, a 31-year-old backpacker with an insatiable thirst for adventure and exploration. Embracing his Indigenous heritage, he finds profound inspiration in the stories and landscapes of his ancestors, often seeking out travel destinations rich in cultural history. Kai meticulously plans each journey using cutting-edge technology, relying on interactive maps and virtual reality tours to envision and organize his travels before setting foot in a new location. Despite his love for high-tech preparation, he values authentic experiences, often straying off the beaten path to connect with local communities and learn their traditions. A natural storyteller, Kai shares his adventures through a travel blog, bringing his readers along with him as he explores the world with an open heart and mind.
